body: You exude a chill that can harm other creatures.
name: Born of Frost
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Frost Giants/New Rules/Frost Giant Feats/Born of Frost

sections.body: Your natural weapons and unarmed strikes deal an additional 1d6 points of cold damage. Creatures that strike you with natural weapons or unarmed strikes take 1 point of cold damage.
sections.name: Benefit
